/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. 

On the left side of the street, modern skyscrapers reach towards the sky, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. In contrast, the right side of the street is adorned with traditional Chinese architecture, showcasing the city's rich history and cultural heritage. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the expansive view. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
